entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as looking horrified yet transfixed by the Riddle-Hermione and Riddle-Harry. He is unable to move or act despite Harry's urging.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the Chosen One and the Boy Who Lived, implying his importance and significance in the story.

entities.name: riddle-hermione
entities.description: Riddle-Hermione is described as more beautiful and yet more terrible than the real Hermione. She is portrayed as evil and menacing.

entities.name: riddle-harry
entities.description: Riddle-Harry is described as having hair swirling like flames and eyes shining red, implying his malevolent nature.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned in comparison to Riddle-Hermione, implying that she is a different person from the evil version.

relationships.description: Ron is transfixed by Riddle-Hermione, unable to move or act despite Harry's urging.
Harry urges Ron to stab the sword, but Ron does not move.
